price: De ki: Eğer Allah, beni ve benimle beraber olanları helak etse ya da bize merhamet etse ne dersiniz? Kâfirleri acı bir azaptan kim kurtarabilir?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya al-lahu waman maʿiya aw raḥimanā faman yujīru al-kāfirīna min ʿadhābin alīmin
